itemDescription: Distinguished Conduct Medal recipient, British Army non-commissioned officer

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Joseph Gallagher, (31 December 1914 – 25 August 1988), was awarded the DCM for his gallantry during the epic defence of Castle Hill on the Imjin River, during the Korean War.

response: * Henry Joseph Gallagher  (1914 – 1988) was awarded the Distinguished Conduct Medal for his gallantry during the Korean War.
*Henry Joseph Gallagher (1914–1988), soldier awarded the Distinguished Conduct Medal during the Korean War.
